title: San Juan County, Washington - Private Property

sections.title: Farm House
sections.content:
**Parcel:** 260833006000 (23.74 acres - Shady Cove LLC)

### Building Details
- **Type:** Residential
- **Square Footage:** [SF]
- **Year Built:** [Year]
- **Bedrooms/Bathrooms:** [Number]
- **Construction Type:** Wood frame
- **Roof Type/Age:** [Type/Year installed]
- **Foundation Type:** [Type]
- **Current Use:** [Primary residence, Guest house, Rental, etc.]
- **Occupancy Status:** [Occupied/Vacant]

### Systems & Utilities
- **Heating:** Electric baseboard heating (multiple zones)
- **Septic:** Septic system with pump
- **Electrical:** Electrical panel with complete circuit directory
- **Water Heater:** Bradford White (25 years old - **CRITICAL: URGENT REPLACEMENT NEEDED**)

### Appliances & Equipment
| Item | Brand/Model | Age/Condition | Notes |
|------|-------------|---------------|-------|
| Refrigerator | LG | 10-15 years old | Functional |
| Range | Premier | Unknown | Electric |
| Water Heater | Bradford White | 25 years old | **CRITICAL FAILURE RISK** - Exceeds 8-12 year lifespan. Immediate replacement required. |

### Critical Maintenance Alert: Water Heater
The water heater is **more than double** its expected lifespan. At 25 years old, it represents an **extremely high risk** of:
1. **Catastrophic tank failure and flooding** - could cause thousands in water damage
2. **Complete loss of hot water** without warning
3. **Significant energy waste** - costing extra on every utility bill
4. **Safety hazards** - potential electrical or pressure issues

**Immediate Actions Until Replacement:**
- Check daily for leaks around the base
- Listen for unusual noises (rumbling, popping from sediment)
- Monitor hot water performance
- Consider placing a water alarm or drip pan under unit
- Know where your water shutoff valve is located

**Replacement Priority:**
- This should be your **#1 priority** for the farmhouse
- Get quotes from licensed plumbers immediately
- Consider upgrading to tankless or heat pump water heater for long-term energy savings
- Budget for professional installation (electrical 240V and plumbing required)

sections.title: Beach House
sections.content:
**Parcel:** 260833006000 (23.74 acres - Shady Cove LLC)

### Building Details
- **Type:** Residential / Guest House
- **Setting:** Nestled in a wooded area near the beach
- **Exterior:** Wood siding, blends with natural surroundings
- **Access:** Gravel path/driveway

### Systems & Utilities
- **Water Shutoff:** Located in an in-ground utility box near the house (documented with photos)
- **Heating:** [To be documented]
- **Electrical:** [To be documented]
- **Septic:** [To be documented]

### Appliances & Equipment
| Item | Brand/Model | Age/Condition | Notes |
|------|-------------|---------------|-------|
| [To be documented] | | | |

### Maintenance Notes
- **Water Shutoff Access:** Ensure the in-ground box remains clear of debris and vegetation for easy access in emergencies.
- **Exterior:** Monitor wood siding for moss or weather damage due to wooded/shaded location.
